c74object.name: geo.rectangularAmplitudes
c74object.digest: Calculate the modal amplitudes relative to a strike location in polar coordinates
c74object.description: Calculate the modal amplitudes relative to a strike location in polar coordinates.

objarg.name: N
objarg.digest: Update the maximum Nth order of the modes
objarg.description: Update the maximum Nth order of the modes.

objarg.name: M
objarg.digest: Update the amount of modes per order
objarg.description: Update the amount of modes per order.

attribute.name: epsilon
attribute.digest: The aspect ratio of the rectangle
attribute.description: The aspect ratio of the rectangle.

attribute.name: M
attribute.digest: The amount of modes per order
attribute.description: The amount of modes per order.

attribute.name: N
attribute.digest: The maximum Nth order of the modes
attribute.description: The maximum Nth order of the modes.
